issue.title: [CF 821] Ele Shaman - Flame Shock
issue.body:
Hi there!

Hope you can help.  I am trying to config TMW but no luck.  I have used the examples in the forums but it does not do what I want it to do.

Basically I want an icon to help with applying/reapplying flame shock.  I would like the icon to appear if my target does not have Flame Shock letting me know to apply it.  I would then like it to disappear after I apply Flame Shock, then reappear when there are 6 seconds or less left before Flame Shock expires on the target so I can reapply it.

So far I have only managed to get it to Show/hide when the flame shock expires.

I am using v6.2.1

Would appreciate ur help

Thanks in advance.


> Posted by CurseForge user sharbani | Imported from CurseForge issue #821 | Raw

comments.body:
Enable both the "Present" and "Absent" Show States & Opacity settings. Then, on the right-hand side of the icon editor, set a maximum duration of 6 seconds.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
